1.name: Hulk-Smasher
1.description: A rocket-aided shoulder tackle smashes the armored suit through whatever, or whoever, happens to be in front of it.

2.name: Hulk-Blaster
2.description: An uppercut stuns the enemy, setting them up for a powerful Repulsor Ray blast.

3.name: Hulk-Buster
3.description: The ultimate in Hulk-Busting technology showcases exactly what it can do.

signature.name: Iron Rage
signature.description: Hulkbuster's armor is reinforced upon receiving damage, making it stronger during tough battles. The perfect counter to Hulk's Rage!

description: Tony Stark, man of means and intelligence, knows what to do when it’s time to battle a raging Hulk – build a Hulkbuster exo-frame to bolster your armor.  Loaded for maximum strength and power with loads of heavy weaponry, this is a must have for anyone looking to SMASH!
